Well I just did upgrade instead of clean nstallation, helll, I think thats even better, nothing was lost, feels like a new instalation anyways, smooth as hell, only one app was not compatible, transmit, everything else perfect, using ssd, you have to reactivate the trim again. I did the upgrade instead of clean installation. Everything working perfectly, smooth as hell. No issues at all, just have to enable trim again for the SSD. Only one app was not compatible now, Transmit which I used to FTP PS3 games.
